about_the_game:
Explore, fight, and fly as a small rabbit with swift moves in this action-adventure game inspired by Zelda and Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon. Discover ancient secrets, vanquish monsters from Chinese mythology, and choose to use dragon power or stay uncorrupted.

Key features
  • Fly through the air, run up walls, and glide across water using wuxia qinggong like in Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon.
  • Fight mythological monsters from the ancient text, Classic of the Mountains and Seas from two thousand years ago
  • Explore the beautiful ancient land of Penglai Immortal Island, filled with gods, secrets, and treasure
  • Choose between the Goddess or the Dragon Emperor. Will you become a hero who saves the world or a demon that destroys it?

Powerful movement abilities
Fly through the air, run up walls, and glide across water using qinggong like in Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon.


Epic and satisfying fights
Vanquish mythological monsters from the ancient text, Classic of the Mountains and Seas from two thousand years ago.


Choose your challenge level
Choose between the Goddess or the Dragon Emperor, who gives you power at a terrible cost. Will you become the hero who saves the world or a demon that destroys it?


Explore the Garden of the Gods
Explore the beautiful ancient land of Penglai Immortal Island, filled with gods, secrets, and treasure.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 / RX 460
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 11.6
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Immortal's Way

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core, 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 / RX 460
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core, 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 Ti / RX Vega 64
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Explore, fight, and fly as a small rabbit with swift moves in this action-adventure game inspired by Zelda and Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon. Discover ancient secrets, vanquish monsters from Chinese mythology, and choose to use dragon power or stay uncorrupted.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
